p:
We next examined inflammasome activation by generating BMDMs from WT mice or mice deficient in inflammasome genes Asc
-/- , Casp1/11
-/- , Nlrp3
-/- or Aim2
-/- . Following coinfection, Asc
-/- , Casp1/11
-/- , and Nlrp3
-/- BMDMs had significantly decreased IL-1β levels compared to WT cells ( Fig 2A). However, BMDMs lacking AIM2 were not significantly different from WT cells during coinfection ( Fig 2A), and they had IL-1β levels that were enhanced during S. p. infection alone ( Fig 2A).
